General.Name: Cubic Sensor and Instrument Co Ltd
General.Description: Cubic Sensor and Instrument Co., Ltd. manufactures gas sensors and sensing solutions worldwide. The company's products include CO2 sensor, formaldehyse & VOC sensor, IAQ controller and monitor, outdoor particulate matter sensing solution, ultrasonic oxygen sensor, TDLAS oxygen sensor, spirometer, automotive air quality sensor, automotive O2 and NO2 sensor, refrigerant gas leakage monitoring sensor, SF6 gas leakage monitoring sensor, residential ultrasonic gas meter, industrial ultrasonic gas meter, particular matter sensor, integrated sensor module, optical particle counter, oil mist sensor, ultrasonic oxygen flow sensor, DLCO gas sensor, ETCO2, Li-battery thermal runway sensor, flammable gas safety monitoring sensor, toxic and hazardous gas safety monitoring sensor, residential ultrasonic gas flow sensor, commercial ultrasonic gas meter, and gas analyzer. It offers its products in the fields of indoor and outdoor air quality monitoring, automotive sensor, health, medical, industry safety, engine emission monitoring, and smart metering. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.
